decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Application Form, Design and Access Statement, PR-PL-G000-XP-01, PR-PL-G200-XE-AL, PR-PL-G200-XP-00-01, PR-PL-G200-P-00-04, received 15.06.2021, PR-PL-G200-S-AL-01, PR-PL-G200-E-AL-05, received 29.10.2021
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site, as indicated in the submitted application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D5 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The roof lights hereby approved shall not protrude more than 150 millimetres beyond the plane of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof.

Reason: To ensure that the development harmonises with the surroundings and the host building, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2 (f) of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012) and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).

| Prior to the development hereby permitted being first occupied, the window proposed to be located on the side elevation of the development shall be glazed with obscured glass up to 1.7m height, and non-opening below 1.7m height. Obscure glazing and non-opening components of these windows shall be maintained for the life of the development unless alternative arrangements are approved in writing by the local planning authority.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities and privacy of the occupiers of adjoining properties, in accordance with section 7 pf the National Planning Policy Framework, policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policy 1.1 (g) of the Ealing
Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Conversion of part of garage into habitable space and installation of two rooflights to roofslope; replacement of windows; insertion of two windows to ground floor side elevation; alteration of rear of roof from hip to gable end including the increase ridge height; side roof dormer extension to northern elevation; front dormer window roof extension; installation of Juliet balcony to rear gable end and installation of two rooflights to side roofslope on southern elevation.
